name: Buff Babies (Vineet Kumar)
description:
Buff Babies is about the baby who is dreaming of trying to fight bedtime. He/She can fight monsters, witches and collect candies throughout the level while doing different combos of attacks including KO punches, spiral kick. At the end fight the boss of the level, your dad the police officer, and wake the baby up from the dream.

Use a controller (preferably Xbox) for playing this game.

Controls (reference as per Xbox Controller):

LS

Movement

A

Jump/Select

B

Back

RB

Light Attack

RT

Heavy Attack

START

Pause Game

Try different variations of the Light and Heavy attack to checkout the combos of what attacks you can do. 

GLHF!
